TipoBonus.name: Nine Points
TipoBonus.description: Exchange one piece from the board to another piece with the same number and score 9

TipoBonus.name: Swap
TipoBonus.description: Swap one piece to another whose is in the queue

TipoBonus.name: Green Square
TipoBonus.description: Exchange one blue square to another green square

TipoBonus.name: Undo Movement
TipoBonus.description: Undo the last movement of the piece
